name: GrandNyational
description:
Welcome to the GrandNyational, where 8 of the best cats bumble around the track not really knowing why they're there. Coax the cat of your choice to be the first to cross the finish line!

How to play:

Choose which of the eight cats you think will win the race. They are all identical so feel free to chose to your favourite, but don't rely on them to win on their own. Use the items at your disposal to make sure the cat of your choice leads the litter.

Cats love that fishy smell, so use fish to lure a cat to a tasty treat. But be warned, who knows how long it will take them to chew the fat.

Cats are truly terrified of cucumbers. Place one in a cats path and watch it run in the opposite direction.

Be warned, cats are fickle creatures. There is always the slight possibility that they'll ignore what's in front of them. Such is the carefree life of a cat.

This is our first ever released game, made for the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2020. We made this game in 48 hours as a team of three , the full credits for which are in the game. We would love to hear your feedback so let us know your thoughts or reach out to us on twitter at @MrNantendo. - Team CurryCat
